item.title: Sign With GPG
item.description: Motivation Came across this signing in dotfiles and I would also want to have the verified in each commit I made in my pc so why not? How-to Install GPG Suite as it allows storing in macOS keychain, without typing each time brew install --cask gpg-suite Don’t install gpg or pinentry-mac as it might cause conflict and also can not be stored in keychain Create a key either from CLI or in GPG Keychain app Noted the name and email should be the same as the git configure Specify location for git In ~/.
